Package ohos.data.usage

Class StatVfs

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.data.usage.StatVfs

  • public class StatVfs
extends Object
    Provides methods to query the capacity of the file system, such as the total and available capacity.
    Since:
    3

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      StatVfs​(String path)
      A constructor used to create a StatVfs instance with the specified path.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      long getAvailableSpace​()
      Obtains the available bytes of the file system for the application.
      long getFreeSpace​()
      Obtains the remaining bytes of the file system.
      long getSpace​()
      Obtains the total bytes of the file system.
      static boolean isSupported​()
      Checks whether StatVfs is supported on current device.
      void reStatVfs​(String path)
      Updates information about the file system with the specified path.

      • isSupported

        public static boolean isSupported​()
        Checks whether StatVfs is supported on current device.
        Returns:
        Returns true if StatVfs is supported on current device; returns false otherwise.

        3

      • getSpace

        public long getSpace​()
        Obtains the total bytes of the file system.
        Returns:
        Returns the total bytes of the file system; returns -1 if the path of the file system is invalid.
        Since:
        4

      • getFreeSpace

        public long getFreeSpace​()
        Obtains the remaining bytes of the file system.
        Returns:
        Returns the remaining bytes of the file system; returns -1 if the path of the file system is invalid.
        Since:
        4

        Obtains the available bytes of the file system for the application.
